title: Zosia Mamet | Trump Returns from Europe as Impeachment Calls Grow Louder: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump using his trip to Europe to enrich himself as calls for his impeachment grow louder.

Then, actress Zosia Mamet talks about her belated honeymoon road trip in an RV with her husband and dog and explains all the RV lingo.

She also takes a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G just for the podcast.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
